title: CU-TEMPORAL-001 User LoggedIn from Malicious IP
description: Inicio de sesión de usuario des de una IP detectada como maliciosa
search:
index=mo365 sourcetype="o365:management:activity" Operation=UserLoggedIn "64.225.63.137" OR "196.196.53.58" 
| search NOT ( 
    [| inputlookup listado_temporal_phishing.csv 
    | stats values(user) as user 
    | format])

title: CU-TEMPORAL-002 User LoggedIn from IP outside Spain
description: Inicio de sesión de usuario des de una IP fuera de España
search:
`o365_management_activity` Workload=AzureActiveDirectory Operation=UserLoggedIn 
| bucket span=5m _time 
| iplocation src_ip
| where Country!="Spain"
| stats count values(user) as user values(Country) as country values(signature) as signature values(UserAgent) as user_agent values(RequestType) as RequestType  min(_time) as firstTime, max(_time) as lastTime values(SessionId) by _time src_ip
